modName: All Spells Powers and Shouts LEGENDARY EDITION
descriptionHtml:
I have painstakingly put together a batch file which gives you all spells, powers, and shouts from vanilla Skyrim as well as all DLCs.

[b]Installation (Omega Noob Edition)[/b]

1) Copy AllSpells.txt into your Skyrim folder (where TESV.exe is located)

2) Run Skyrim, go in game, bring up the console (~) and type "bat AllSpells"

[b]IMPORTANT - YOU MUST HAVE YOUR PLUGIN LOAD ORDER LOOK LIKE THIS:[/b]

Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Dawnguard.esm
HearthFires.esm
DragonBorn.esm

[b]BECAUSE THE DAWNGUARD STUFF IS UNDER "02" AND THE DRAGONBORN STUFF IS UNDER "04."[/b]

If you're using USKP, I would recommend upgrading to the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url]Â so it doesn't affect your load order, or just going into the .txt file and manually editing it yourself to reflect your load order.

I added this version because though I appreciate the other All Spells batches out there, I was frustrated that they didn't include powers or shouts. I love me my Black Market.

Feel free to leave any feedback and let me know if I missed anything as well as edit the .txt as much as you like to meet your needs.

BATCH FILES BY YA BOY ALPHA:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77932/?]All Spells Powers and Shouts LEGENDARY EDITION[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77947/?]All Unique Items Dragon Priest Masks and Daedric Artifacts LEGENDARY EDITION[/url]
author: Alphazombie220
